page.title: 03Animals At Home
page.content: Our family lives in the country and we own a{dog,}two{rabbits,}seven {guinea pigs,}sixteen{ducks,}four {chickens}and some{goldfish. In the morning my dad feeds all the animals, and I do it in the afternoon. The{dog}gets fed once a day, and must always have clean water(like all the animals). My dad takes our dog for a walk twice a day. The{rabbits}have got a run that they are let into during the day. They are shut in their hutch at night. The {guinea pigs}sometimes have bread and milk. The{ducks}are fed chicken food and we often give them grass. My dad made them a pond and we clean it out each month. They have got a hutch to shelter in. It is cleaned out each week.
